be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers

Class AddCollaboratorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers.AddCollaboratorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddCollaboratorViewController.ViewListener

    public class AddCollaboratorController
extends java.lang.Object
implements AddCollaboratorViewController.ViewListener
    Handle the logic of adding a collaborator in a project. This class is the listener of the AddCollaboratorViewController.ViewListener.
    This will manage the interaction on the AddCollaboratorView.fxml view.

      • onAskCollaborator

        public void onAskCollaborator(java.lang.String notifiedUsername)
        This is the listener action for the add collaborator button. This will try to add a User as collaborator to the current project. First this will try to get the id of the user with notifiedUserName.
        Before sending a collaboration request it will checks that :
        - the current user cannot add himself as collaborator.
        - the notifiedUserName match a user.
        - the notifiedUserName is not already a collaborator.
        - A notification hasn't already been sent to the user for the same project.
        In case of error, a message is displayed, otherwise the collaboration request is sent.
        Specified by:
        onAskCollaborator in interface AddCollaboratorViewController.ViewListener
        Parameters:
        notifiedUsername - the userName to notify.

      • goBack

        public void goBack()
